about.title: About
about.creator: Creator
about.description: RelaxDrive — control platform. Web, Desktop Control Center, real-time orders and drivers.
about.staffOnly: This web app is for staff only: drivers, control staff, and administrators. Clients (passengers) do not have access — they are managed in the Clients section by control staff.
about.driverAccess: As a driver you have access to: My trips, Map, Translation.
about.driverDetail: My trips: view only orders assigned to you; accept or reject new assignments; start trip, mark arrived at pickup (and at middle stop for roundtrips), complete trip. Wait timer with billing (first 5 min free). Map shows your location and route; share location so control sees you in real time. Translation: voice-to-text and history for multilingual support. You see your today and total ride stats. In short: you receive trips, report status, and get navigation and translation tools.
about.dispatcherAccess: As control staff you have access to: Dashboard, Calendar, Clients, Translation, Analytics, Session monitor.
about.dispatcherDetail: Dashboard: create orders (pickup/dropoff, time, client); see all active and scheduled orders on the map; assign drivers to orders; view driver locations and ETAs; receive alerts (new order, assignment, rejection, completion). Calendar: plan orders by day/week, see conflicts. Clients: add and search clients by phone/name, export CSV, create a new order from a client with one click. Translation and Analytics for operational support. Session monitor: see who is online (device, IP, last active). You control the full order and driver workflow.
about.adminAccess: As an administrator you have full access: all control features plus Roles, Cost control, White label, Audit logs, System health.
about.locationGuideTitle: How to appear on the map
about.locationGuideIntro: Drivers need to allow location access and go online so control sees you on the dashboard map.
about.locationGuideStep1: When the browser asks for location permission, choose Allow.
about.locationGuideStep2: On the Dashboard, tap «Go online». Your position is then sent and you appear on the map.
about.locationGuideStep3: If you previously blocked location: open this site in the browser → tap the lock or info icon in the address bar → Site settings / Permissions → set Location to Allow.
about.locationGuideSuccess: When it works you’ll see «You’re on the map». Control sees your position within a few seconds.
about.locationGuidePhone1: Turn on device Location: Settings → Location (or Privacy → Location Services).
about.locationGuidePhone2: Allow this site to use location: Chrome — tap ⋮ → Settings → Site settings → Location → set to Allow for this site; Safari — Settings → Safari → Location → allow for this website.
about.locationGuidePhone3: Open the app in the browser, tap «Go online». If the browser asks for location, tap Allow.
about.instructionsIntro: Short guide by role: what the system does and how to use it.
about.instructionsGeneral: RelaxDrive is a comprehensive control platform with real-time GPS tracking, intelligent route planning, and automated driver assignment. Key features: Live map with driver locations and routes; Zones (geofencing) for service areas; Phone database for number transfers; Address history with categorization (Home, Synagogue, School, Hospital, Store, Office); Driver reports (Police, Traffic, Work Zone, Crash) with 1-minute auto-expiry; Speedometer and standing timer for drivers; Alternative routes with traffic info; Sequential Driver IDs (1, 2, 3...) and Car IDs (Minivan1, Sedan1); Multi-language support with voice translation; Planning algorithm runs every 5 minutes to compute risk levels and suggest optimal driver assignments.
about.instructionsDispatcher: Dashboard: Create orders with pickup/dropoff addresses (manual entry or pick on map), optional middle stops for roundtrips, pickup time, passenger info, and place types (Home, Synagogue, School, etc.). View all active and scheduled orders on the interactive map with zones overlay. Assign drivers manually or use 'Assign suggested' for AI-powered assignment. Monitor 'Unassigned: N' and 'At risk: M' counters. Delay orders (+5/+10 min), mark manual assignments, delete trips. Drivers List: View all drivers with sequential IDs, filter by car type (Sedan/Minivan/SUV), location status (on map/offline), edit Driver ID and Car ID, delete drivers with confirmation. Calendar: Plan orders by day/week, view conflicts, see driver schedules. Clients: Add clients with phone/name, view address history with categories, create orders from client profiles. Phone Database: Manage transferred numbers (old → new mappings). Pending Drivers: Approve or reject new driver registrations. Zones: View service area polygons on map (interactive, clickable). Session monitor: see who's online (device, IP, last active). Analytics: Export data, view statistics.
about.instructionsDriver: Dashboard: 'Today's rides: N' shows your assigned trips. For each order: Accept (or Reject), then Arrived at pickup → Start ride → Complete. For roundtrips: Arrive at middle stop → wait timer (first 5 min free, billing after) → Start to final → Complete. GPS Tracking: Share location ('Go online') so control sees you in real time with smooth marker animation (1s smoothing). Your marker shows car icon or arrow (rotates with heading), displays speed in mph, standing timer ('here for X min'), and heading direction ('To pickup', 'To dropoff'). Navigation: View route on map with turn-by-turn instructions, alternative routes with traffic info, distance and ETA. Use Google Maps/Waze for external navigation. Reports: Post real-time reports on map (Police, Traffic, Work Zone, Car Crash) - auto-expire after 1 minute. Translation: Voice-to-text and history for multilingual support. Stats: View today's rides and total earnings/miles.
about.instructionsAdmin: All control features plus: Drivers Management: Edit Driver IDs (sequential: 1, 2, 3...) and Car IDs (type-based: Minivan1, Sedan1, SUV1), delete drivers with confirmation modal, view driver details (trip history, earnings, stats). Roles: Change user roles (Driver/Control/Admin), block/ban users with reason and expiry, reset passwords. Phone Database: Manage transferred phone numbers (old → new mappings) for seamless client transitions. Zones: Create and manage service area polygons (geofencing) with custom colors, view on map. Pending Drivers: Approve or reject new driver registrations. Cost Control: View API usage and limits (maps, translation, AI, TTS), receive alerts when limits are exceeded. White Label: Customize logo, colors, domains for branding. Audit Logs: Filter by user/action/resource, track all system changes. System Health: Monitor service status, view error logs. Session Monitor: See all online users with device, IP, last active time. Analytics: Export comprehensive data, view system-wide statistics.

admin.title: Administrator Role
admin.description: Full system access with all control capabilities plus administrative controls
keyFeatures: User Management: Create, edit, delete users; change roles; block/ban with expiry dates
System Configuration: White label branding, cost control limits, service area zones
Security: Audit logs, session monitoring, password resets, role-based access control
Analytics: System-wide statistics, export data, driver performance metrics
Oversight: Approve/reject driver registrations, manage phone number transfers
workflows: Onboarding: Approve pending drivers → Assign Driver ID and Car ID → Set availability
Monitoring: Check audit logs for suspicious activity → Review cost control alerts → Monitor session activity
Troubleshooting: Reset user passwords → Unblock accounts → Review system health status

dispatcher.title: Control Role
dispatcher.description: Operational control for order management and driver coordination
keyFeatures: Order Creation: Manual entry or map-based pickup/dropoff selection with scheduling
Driver Assignment: View ETAs, assign manually or use AI suggestions, swap drivers mid-trip
Live Monitoring: Real-time map with driver locations, order statuses, and route tracking
Client Management: Search passengers by phone/name, view address history, create orders from profiles
Planning: Calendar view for scheduling conflicts, risk assessment for unassigned orders
workflows: New Order: Create order → Check driver ETAs → Assign best driver → Monitor progress → Mark complete
Emergency: Passenger requests stop → Add waypoint → Driver sees updated route
Scheduling: View calendar → Identify conflicts → Adjust pickup times → Assign drivers in advance

driver.title: Driver Role
driver.description: Field operations for trip execution and navigation
keyFeatures: Trip Management: Accept/reject assignments, update status (arrived, started, completed)
Navigation: Turn-by-turn instructions, alternative routes, traffic info, Google Maps/Waze integration
Location Sharing: Real-time GPS tracking with heading, speed (mph), and standing time display
Reports: Submit road hazards (police, traffic, construction, accidents) visible to other drivers
Earnings: View today's rides, total earnings, miles driven, wait time charges
workflows: Standard Trip: Receive assignment → Accept → Navigate to pickup → Arrive → Start ride → Navigate to dropoff → Complete
Roundtrip: Arrive at pickup → Start → Arrive at middle stop → Wait (billing after 5 min) → Start to final → Complete
Passenger Stop: During trip → Passenger requests stop → Control adds waypoint → Continue to final destination
